title: Shooter Game 100 Tracks
description: Shooter Game Soundtrack Pack is a high-quality pack of 100 tracks for royalty-free use in video games, created by Bobby Cole.
longDescription:
"Shooter Game Soundtrack" by Bobby Cole energizes the fast-paced and strategic gameplay of shooter games with 100 royalty-free tracks. This collection features intense, driving beats and atmospheric pieces that maintain high energy and focus, enhancing the thrilling action of each encounter.


Listen to my Shooter Game Soundtrack Sampler here: https://soundcloud.com/bobbycole/robotic-sampler


Once you've purchased this pack, feel free to contact me directly at hello@bobbycole.co.uk. I'm available to provide additional services such as track adjustments, consultation to select the best-suited tracks for your game, and custom music composition, all for an additional fee.


This Mega Pack includes 100 tracks:

  • 5 hours of music
  • 100 original high-quality tracks
  • Unlimited Royalty-Free license

 

Tracks details:

  • Audio sample rate: 44.1 kHz
  • Format: .wav
  • Bit depth: 16 bit
  • Loopable: No
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  3D Shooter Computer Game
  • Demon Warrior
  • Doom Drum and Bass
  • Evil Dark Dubstep
  • Intense Hard House
  • Music for a Killer
  • Powerful Dark Dubstep
  • Sinister Evacuation
  • Tension Lies
  • The Future of Humanity
  •  And many more


Number of Audio Wavs: 100

Number of Audio Cues: 100

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 5 hours 28 minutes

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: bobbycole.co.uk
